subject: Best practice with EJB
msgSnippet: Hi, I wonder if there is a preferd way to use JUnit with EJB in your opinion? What is best practice and have anyone used any extensions like JUnitEE
messageBody:
Hi,
I wonder if there is a preferd way to use JUnit with EJB in your opinion?
What is best practice and have anyone used any extensions like JUnitEE
(http://www.infohazard.org/junitee/) or j2eeunit
(http://j2eeunit.sourceforge.net/)?

Any tips regarding using Visual Cafe and Weblogic 6 with junit would be
great.

Thank you.
